nodes.text: A cart was a primitive two-wheeled wagon vehicle.
Cart-type vehicles were used on multiple planets, such as Cerea, where they were pulled by Cerean pack animals.
On Tatooine, carts were used by moisture farmers and sometimes drawn by dewbacks. A smaller, two-wheeled variation of a cart pushed by DUM-series pit droids was in Mos Espa in 32 BBY.
The Ewok natives of Endor used carts and harnessed them to pack animals. The Quorks from Endor used carts to pull loads of hay.
Carts were also used by the farm villagers of the planet Jomark.
